mapper.sql: id, name, ip, operate_system, org_structure_id, org_structure_name, sys_client_id, confidentiality_level, gmt_create, gmt_modified
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()

id,
name,
ip,
operate_system,
org_structure_id,
org_structure_name,
sys_client_id,

mapper.update:
update entity_access_device
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operate_system = #{operateSystem,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
org_structure_id = #{orgStructureId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
org_structure_name = #{orgStructureName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sys_client_id = #{sysClientId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
confidentiality_level = #{confidentialityLevel,jdbcType=TINYINT},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update entity_access_device set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operate_system = #{operateSystem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, org_structure_id = #{orgStructureId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, org_structure_name = #{orgStructureName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sys_client_id = #{sysClientId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, confidentiality_level = #{confidentialityLevel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select entity.* from entity_access_device entity INNER JOIN sys_client_info client ON client.id=entity.sys_client_id
and entity.name like CONCAT('%', #{search,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and entity.name like CONCAT('%', #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and entity.ip like CONCAT('%', #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and entity.org_structure_name = #{signScope,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and confidentiality_level = #{confidentialityLevel,jdbcType=TINYINT}
order by entity.gmt_create desc, entity.id desc
select entity.* from entity_access_device entity INNER JOIN sys_client_info clientInfo ON clientInfo.id=entity.sys_client_id where entity.ip = #{businessIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select entity.* from entity_access_device entity INNER JOIN user_entity_access_device user_entity ON entity.id=user_entity.entity_access_device_id INNER JOIN user u ON u.id=user_entity.user_id where user_entity.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
